entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has been picturing his parents' deaths for three years. He is the son of James and Lily Potter.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter was Harry's father who tried to hold off Voldemort while shielding his wife and son.

entities.name: lily potter
entities.description: Lily Potter was Harry's mother who begged Voldemort to kill her instead of her son.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist who killed James and Lily Potter. He tried to kill Harry but was thwarted by his mother's sacrifice.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail betrayed James and Lily Potter's whereabouts to Voldemort, leading to their deaths.

relationships.description: Voldemort tried to kill Lily Potter but she sacrificed herself instead.
Wormtail betrayed James and Lily Potter's whereabouts to Voldemort.
Lily Potter protected her son Harry from Voldemort's killing curse.
